Name: Koala
Description: It lives in trees and is from Australia.

Name: Leopard
Description: Fast animal from Africa. Will eat you :))

Name: Giraffe
Description: Found in Africa, this creature has a long neck

Name: Panda
Description: It munches on bamboo and resembles a bear.

Name: Kangoroo
Description: A large marsupial mammal native to Australia, known for its powerful hind legs used for hopping and its pouch for carrying young joeys.

Name: Capybara
Description: Living near water bodies, it is well-adapted for aquatic environments.

Name: Red Panda
Description: This animal is a small mammal native to the eastern Himalayas and southwestern China. It has a reddish-brown color, a long, shaggy tail, and a waddling gait due to its shorter front legs. It is slightly larger than a domestic cat. Although it shares the name with the more famous black and white bear, they are not closely related. This creature is primarily nocturnal and is a solitary animal, mainly feeding on bamboo, but also eats eggs, birds, and insects. It is known for its climbing ability and spends most of its life in trees.

Name: Lion
Description: Lives in Africa. Has a beautiful mane.
